channel.title: active reading on
channel.description: Recent content in active reading on

item.title: highlight colors for pdfs
item.description: 🔴️ Red –> Disagree With Author 🟠️ Orange –> Important Point By Author 🟡️ Yellow –> Interesting Point 🟢️ Green –> Important To Me 🔵️ Blue –> Notes After Initial Iteration 🟣️ Magenta –> literary note to look up later
